title: Anna and the Mongolian Princess: Quentin Academy of Magical Arts and Sciences, Volume 3
features: A young girl in a magical world. An invisible power attacking. Will she prevent a tragedy?
Anna Cameron feels uprooted. The day has come for the ten-year-old to begin her studies at Quentin Academy, however, because home is best, she rebels against flying to school.But at last, she flies.

On her first day, she meets a girl with intense blue eyes. Inexplicably, this girl exudes on Anna an uncanny influence.Watching that girl invade her family, Anna fears her parents falling under her spell.Prevented from maintaining harmony in her family by the uncanny girl's constant presence, Anna watches in horror as a child disappears, plunging her peaceful home into chaos.Can Anna and her loyal friends find and rescue the missing child, or will they suffer a terrible loss?Anna and the Missing Child is thecaptivating first book of thefantastic science fantasy seriesaround Quentin Academy.If you like new magical worlds,kindness and friendship,and courage in the face of danger,then you'll love this sweeping adventureby award-winning author Brigitte Novalis.
